userData.name: Artem Shakun
userData.title: self-summary
userData.description: I am a front-end developer with 3 years of experience in building web applications. I have worked in international teams, participated in large-scale projects, and contributed to dynamic startup environments. I have also independently led projects, which enhanced my problem-solving and leadership skills. I am passionate about coding and constantly strive to improve my expertise.
